Question: Please perform a comprehensive analysis of the audio file located at /root/music/mixkit-retro-game-emergency-alarm-1000.wav. Then return the precise tempo of the track, to two decimal places.

annotator_metadata.Steps:
1. Load the audio file
2. Compute the beat track of the audio to understand its rhythmic structure. 
3. Extract the Mel-Frequency Cepstral Coefficients (MFCCs) from the audio to analyze its spectral content.
4. Compute the Chroma Constant-Q Transform (CQT) to analyze the chromatic content of the audio. 
5. Write a summary document outlining the key findings and insights from the analysis.

Question: Gather information on clinical trial NCT04280705 and return its full title.
answer:
Brief Title: Adaptive COVID-19 Treatment Trial (ACTT)
Official Title: A Multicenter, Adaptive, Randomized Blinded Controlled Trial of the Safety and Efficacy of Investigational Therapeutics for the Treatment of COVID-19 in Hospitalized Adults

annotator_metadata.Steps:
1. Retrieves publications and other references associated with a single clinical trial identified by its NCT ID
2. Generate a markdown report
3. Write it to the path
